name: Ghastly Gathering
description:
You're at your deceased friend's house, you left a box in the attic a long time ago. You've decided that now is the time to go get it!  Do you dare go further into the house when you find a ring and a note from your "deceased friend"?

Control:
[A] [D] or arrow keys to move
[E] interact
[space] use ring

This game is made by Karina and August  SW1 E21.  Hope you enjoy our game for the AAU jam:P

Credits given to all external assets used below 
Sound-of-party2 by soundhunterjulie :
